text: hrux phu dı lea thi srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa thrng hlang na cak fak fa kæ phwk cea læw rea di hı swn tang «ngxkngey xyang swyngam phwk cea k mi samarth thi ca thahı tnmi ngxkngey khun ma di ca mi phracea xun khukheiyng kab xallxh xik hrux?Pela dxk! Phwk khea pen hmu chn phu tang phakhi
